topic.title: HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: ALS Command Reference: Control

ul.li: helion migrate: Move the application to a different space.
helion restage: Restage an application and regenerate its droplet.

section.title: Syntax
section.p: For more information, use the helion help or helion help [command] commands.

section.title: helion migrate <application> <destination>
section.p: Move the application to a different space.

row.entry: --destination-organization, --dest-org, -D
The organization of the destination space, if not the current org.
--manifest
Path of the manifest file to use. If not specified, a search is performed.
--organization, -o
The organization to use. If not specified programmatically, the user is prompted to choose an organization.
--path
Path of the directory or file holding the application files to push. Defaults to the current working directory.
--space, -s
The once-off space to use for the current operation, specified by name. Cannot be used together with --space-guid.
--space-guid
The once-off space to use for the current operation, specified by GUID. Cannot be used together with --space.
--target
The once-off target to use for the current operation only.
--token
The once-off authentication token to use for the current operation only.
--token-file
Path to an existing and readable file containing the targets and authorization tokens.

section.title: helion restage <application>
section.p: Restages an application and regenerates its droplet.

row.entry: --manifest
Path of the manifest file to use. If not specified, a search is performed.
--no-tail
Request the target to stop streaming the log.
--organization, -o
The organization to use. If not specified programmatically, the user is prompted to choose an organization.
--path
Path of the directory or file holding the application files to push. Defaults to the current working directory.
--space, -s
The once-off space to use for the current operation, specified by name. Cannot be used together with --space-guid.
--space-guid
The once-off space to use for the current operation, specified by GUID. Cannot be used together with --space.
--tail
Request the target to start streaming the log.
